name: Dragon Ball Z: The Legacy of Goku II
name_original: Dragon Ball Z: The Legacy of Goku II
description:
Dragon Ball Z: The Legacy of Goku is a series of video games for the Game Boy Advance, based on the anime series Dragon Ball Z. All three games are action role-playing games.
The sequel to Dragon Ball Z: The Legacy of Goku, Dragon Ball Z: The Legacy of Goku II was developed by Webfoot Technologies and released in 2003.
Due to its sales the game was released by Banpresto in Japan (being the only one from the series to be released there) under the title Dragon Ball Z: The Legacy of Goku II International on July 23, 2004.
